required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Nutritional Parameters and Other Risk Factors Affecting Severity of Pneumonia in Children Under Five Years in Upper Egypt
clinical_study.official_title: Nutritional Parameters and Other Risk Factors Affecting Severity of Pneumonia in Children Under Five Years in Upper Egypt

brief_summary.textblock: Decrease mortality rate resulting from pneumonia

detailed_description.textblock: Recruiting patients with pneumonia admitted at Assiut University hospital . Then assessment of their condition and severity of pneumonia by examination and X-ray chest . After that, we aim at assessment their nutrition status and it's effect on severity of pneumonia. So we aim to investigate them by CBC, Albumin, CRP and CXR and correlate these parameters with the severity of pneumonia to assess the impact of nutrition on outcome of chest infections

primary_outcome.measure: ratio of body mass index in patients with pneumonia
primary_outcome.description: we calculate height of patients in metres and weight in Kg then we divide the weight over the height square to get the body mass index

secondary_outcome.measure: Concentration of Albumin in patients with pneumonia in g/dl
secondary_outcome.description: blood samlpe will be taken for measuring Albumin level

secondary_outcome.measure: Hemoglobin level in patients with pnemonia in g/dl
secondary_outcome.description: blood samlpe will be taken for measuring hemoglobin level

intervention.intervention_name: Measurement of nutritional parameters in children with pneumonia
intervention.description: measurement of Body Mass Index, head circumference, weight, length

study_pop.textblock: children admitted at Assiut university children hospital below five years with diagnosis of pneumonia on admission.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Diagnosis of pneumonia on day 1 of hospital admission.
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with cardiac diseases
- patients with immune deficiency disorders

responsible_party.investigator_title: Resident at Assiut University children hospital

clinical_study.keyword: Pneumonia, nutrition, blood tests, body mass index

patient_data.ipd_description: No identifiable data will be available to others apart from me as data collector
